requests.name: Create Holiday
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "flightIncluded": true,
  "accomodationIncluded": true,
  "destination": "http://localhost:9000/api/opentravel/destinations/2",
  "startOn": "2016-10-17",
  "daysCount": 15,
  "departFrom": "Eindhoven Airport",
  "price": 500,
  "packageInfo": "Group Travel 'On a shoe string'"

requests.name: Replace Destination
Update Destination
Create Destination
requests.description:
curl -i -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d '{  
    "name" : "Transylvania",  
    "country": "RO", 
    "facts": [
          "Transylvania features as Lonelyplanet #1 Region to travel to in 2016: http://www.lonelyplanet.com/best-in-travel/regions/1",
          "The path from Buckingham Palace to Braşov might not seem immediately apparent, but Prince Charles supports a number of conservation projects in Transylvania. The UK royal has even planted a wildflower meadow at England’s Highgrove Gardens to remind him of the Transylvanian countryside."
        ],
    "description" : "Mountain thrills and edgy art in Vlad's former home" 
}' 

-i ensures you can see the response message including the headers. The URI of the newly created Destination is shown
-X POST signals this a POST used to create a new entry
-H "Content-Type:application/json" sets the content type so the application knows the payload contains a JSON object
-d the data being sent
